metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12291 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The on_get_missing_events function in handlers/federation.py in Matrix Synapse before 0.31.1 has a security bug in the get_missing_events federation API where event visibility rules were not applied correctly.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 1.64.0-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.64.0-3').
